original_text:
Treasures of the Pyramids
Informazioni generali
Software: IGT
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco: 40
Valore minimo gettone.: 0,01 €
Valore massimo gettone: 1 €
Autoplay: Si
Return to player (RTP): 96,19%

Caratteristiche principali
Treasures of the Pyramids rientra a pieno titolo tra le migliori slot a tema Antico Egitto, pur presentando qualche dettaglio curioso che la rende “particolare”.
I simboli ovviamente fanno riferimento alla cultura egiziana ma è presente una pantera nera che a ben vedere non è molto coerente col tema!
La grafica non è strepitosa in quanto non sono presenti animazioni 3D o effetti speciali, tuttavia lo sfondo dorato su cui si muove la pantera nera e i simboli luccicanti sui rulli la rendono visivamente molto gradevole.
La slot della software house a stelle e strisce IGT ha una struttura classica a cinque rulli e 40 linee di pagamento e un sistema di puntate basato sui gettoni.
Prima di iniziare una partita occorre impostare il valore dei gettoni, che va da un minimo di 0,01 € fino a un massimo di 1€ per ciascun giro, dopodiché vi sarà chiesto di selezionare il numero dei gettoni che intendete giocare, da 1 a 10, e su quante linee volete puntare, su 1, 10, 20, 30 o tutte le 40 linee di pagamento.

Simboli, Wild e Scatter
I simboli, ad eccezion fatta per la già citata pantera nera, sono tutti dei riferimenti alla cultura dell’antico popolo egiziano: troviamo monili di vario tipo, le piramidi, l’Ankh o croce Ansata (antico simbolo che rappresenta la vita) e l’occhio destro del dio falco Horus.
Accanto a questi, sono proposti in stile geroglifico le lettere e i numeri corrispondenti alle carte da poker dal 9 all’Asso.
La pantera nera in Treasures of the Pyramids è il simbolo Wild, con funzione di Jolly: può infatti sostituire tutti gli altri simboli, tranne quello Scatter, sui rulli per il completamento di un allineamento vincente. Inoltre, se compare su tutti i cinque rulli, paga una vincita di ben 5000 gettoni!
Lo Scatter è invece un’imponente piramide che dà accesso all’unica funzionalità bonus di questa slot, ossia i giri gratuiti. Se compare 3 volte in qualsiasi posizione sui rulli saranno attivati 8 giri gratuiti, se ne vinceranno 15 con 4 piramidi e 100 se lo Scatter occupa tutti i cinque rulli.
In seguito a ogni vincita di qualsiasi entità, sarà data al giocatore la possibilità di raddoppiare il montepremi con una funzione Gamble: comparirà una carta girata della quale bisognerà indovinare il colore, nero o rosso. Se la scommessa è giusta il montepremi sarà raddoppiato, se è sbagliata purtroppo si perde quanto vinto in precedenza.

Slot simili a Treasures of the Pyramids
Il tema dell’Antico Egitto rappresenta nel mondo delle slot machine una vena che pare non esaurirsi mai e tutte le principali software house del mondo hanno nel loro catalogo almeno un titolo che celebra questa civiltà.
Una delle slot a tema Egitto più giocate in assoluto al mondo è Book of Ra, disponibile in diverse versioni tra cui la Deluxe e la 6, per giocare e vincere sotto lo sguardo fiero della Sfinge!

Treasures of the Pyramids

General Information:
Software: IGT
Reels: 5
Paylines: 40
Minimum Coin Value: €0.01
Maximum Coin Value: €1
Autoplay: Yes
Return to Player (RTP): 96.19%

Gameplay:
Treasures of the Pyramids is a top-tier slot game with an Ancient Egyptian theme, featuring some unique details that sets it apart from the rest. While the symbols naturally reference the Egyptian culture, there is a black panther present that seems out of place with the theme. However, the golden background on which the black panther moves and the shimmering symbols on the reels make it visually pleasing.

The game has a classic structure of five reels and 40 paylines, with a betting system based on coins. Before starting a game, you need to set the value of the coins, which ranges from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €1 per spin. After that, you will be asked to select how many coins you want to bet, from 1 to 10, and on how many paylines you want to bet, whether it's on 1, 10, 20, 30, or all 40 paylines.

Symbols, Wild and Scatter:
The symbols, except for the black panther, are all references to the ancient Egyptian culture such as various types of jewelry, pyramids, the Ankh or Ansata cross (an ancient symbol that represents life), and the right eye of the falcon god Horus. Additionally, the letters and numbers corresponding to the poker cards from 9 to Ace also appear in hieroglyphic style. The black panther in Treasures of the Pyramids is the Wild symbol, acting as a Joker, as it can replace all other symbols except the Scatter on the reels to complete a winning combination. Moreover, if it appears on all five reels, it pays a whopping 5000 coins! The Scatter is an impressive pyramid that gives access to the only bonus feature of this slot, the free spins. If it appears three times in any position on the reels, eight free spins will be activated, fifteen if four pyramids appear, and a hundred if the Scatter appears on all five reels.

Similar Slots:
The Ancient Egyptian theme in the world of slots is a vein that seems never to run out. All major software houses in the world have at least one title in their catalogs celebrating this civilization. One of the most played Egyptian-themed slots in the world is Book of Ra, available in various versions, including the Deluxe and the 6. Play and win under the watchful eye of the Sphinx!

Below is a review of the game "Treasures of the Pyramids".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Game Structure and Symbols

Treasures of the Pyramids takes players on a journey to ancient Egypt with symbols to match. The symbols include various types of jewelry, pyramids, the Ankh or Ansata cross, and the right eye of Horus, along with hieroglyphic-style letters and numbers corresponding to poker cards from 9 to Ace. The black panther symbol seems out of place in this culturally-themed slot game and acts as the Wild symbol. The game has a classic structure of five reels and 40 paylines.

Betting Options and Paylines

Players must first set the value of their tokens, ranging from €0.01 to €1 per spin. They are then asked to select the number of tokens they wish to play, from 1 to 10, and on how many paylines they want to bet, on 1, 10, 20, 30, or all 40 paylines. The max bet in this game is €400 per spin.

Unique Black Panther Symbol

The black panther appears as the Wild symbol in Treasures of the Pyramids and can replace any other symbol on the reels to complete a winning combination. If it appears on all five reels, players will win a prize of 5000 tokens. Although the black panther doesn't quite fit in with the Ancient Egyptian theme, it brings an element of excitement to the game and enhances winning potential.

Free Spin Feature with Potential for Big Wins

The Scatter symbol, represented by an imposing pyramid, triggers the free spin feature. If the Scatter appears in any position on the reels three times, players will be given eight free spins. If four pyramids appear, players will win 15 free spins, and if the Scatter symbol covers all five reels, players will be rewarded with 100 free spins. The free spin feature comes with the potential for big wins and can be re-triggered.

Gamble Feature for Doubled Winnings

After any winning combination, players have the option to double their winnings with the Gamble feature. To double their winnings, players must correctly guess the color of a face-down card, either black or red. If they guess correctly, their winnings will be doubled, but if they guess wrong, they will lose their previous winnings.

Review: Treasures of the Pyramids is a top-notch slot game based on the theme of Ancient Egypt with some interesting details that make it a standout among others in this genre.
The symbols obviously reference the Egyptian culture, with the exception of the black panther, which seems like an odd addition to the game.
Though the graphics are not mind-blowing as there are no 3D animations or special effects, the golden background on which the black panther moves and the sparkling symbols on the reels make for an aesthetically pleasing game.
This slot game from IGT has a classic structure of five reels and 40 paylines with a betting system based on tokens.
Before starting to play, players must set the value of their tokens, which can range from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €1 per spin. They will then be asked to select the number of tokens they wish to play, from 1 to 10, and on how many paylines they want to bet, on 1, 10, 20, 30, or all 40 paylines.

Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters
The symbols are all references to the culture of the ancient Egyptian people, except for the aforementioned black panther, including various types of jewelry, pyramids, the Ankh or Ansata cross (an ancient symbol representing life), and the right eye of the falcon god Horus. The letters and numbers corresponding to the poker cards from 9 to Ace are also included in hieroglyphic style.
The black panther in Treasures of the Pyramids is the Wild symbol and acts as a Joker, as it can replace all other symbols, except for the Scatter, on the reels to complete a winning combination. Moreover, if it appears on all five reels, players will win a prize of 5000 tokens!
The Scatter symbol takes the form of an imposing pyramid, which triggers the only bonus feature of this slot game, namely free spins. If it appears in any position on the reels three times, eight free spins will be activated. If four pyramids appear, players will win 15 free spins, and if the Scatter symbol covers all five reels, players will win 100 free spins.
After any winning combination, players will have the option to double their winnings with the Gamble feature. Players must guess the color of a face-down card, either black or red. If they guess correctly, their winnings will be doubled, but if they guess wrong, they will lose their previous winnings.

Similar Slots to Treasures of the Pyramids
The theme of Ancient Egypt remains a popular choice for slot machines and a favorite among experienced gamblers. Book of Ra, available in various versions like the Deluxe and the 6, is one of the most played Egyptian-themed slots in the world, allowing players to play and win big under the watchful eye of the Sphinx!
